title: Fix broken web test objects with Time Capsule in Katalon Studio
description: From version 7.8.0, Katalon Studio supports the Time Capsule feature to restore the state of your AUT when a test failed due to broken locators. You can generate a Time Capsule to fix broken web test objects that are not automatically fixed by the Self-healing feature.

frontMatter.title: Fix broken web test objects with Time Capsule in Katalon Studio
